comment_text: The proposed regulation addresses critical gaps in our current data protection framework. I support the comprehensive approach taken.
Implementation costs will be significant for our industry. Request consideration of phased rollout with support for smaller players.
As a citizen, I'm pleased to see strong privacy protections being proposed. This regulation will help restore trust in digital services.
The enforcement mechanisms need strengthening. Without proper oversight, even good regulations fail to achieve their objectives.
International harmonization should be considered to avoid creating trade barriers while maintaining high privacy standards.
